summary: Redesign the SML Mahindra website (smlmahindra.com) with a modern, advanced, and fresh new look to replace the current outdated design.
architectural_notes: Project is a website redesign inspired by smlmahindra.com — focus on modern, clean, advanced aesthetics
Retain core content sections from original site: products, about, dealers, contact
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide cinematic shot of a modern SML commercial bus or truck driving on a highway at dusk, dramatic sky, volumetric lighting, photorealistic style (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Clean studio render of a white light commercial vehicle (LCV) on a dark background with subtle reflections (vehicle-lcv.dim_800x500.png)
- Clean studio render of a modern school/staff bus in white and amber livery on dark background (vehicle-bus.dim_800x500.png)
- Clean studio render of a heavy-duty truck in dark metallic finish on dark background (vehicle-truck.dim_800x500.png)
- Abstract dark metallic geometric pattern — subtle texture for section background use (section-bg-texture.dim_1920x600.png)
- Modern SML Mahindra brand logo mark — stylized 'SML' lettermark in amber on dark background (logo-mark.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Design and implement a bold, modern visual theme across the entire site: dark charcoal/steel base palette with vibrant amber/orange accent color, sharp geometric layout, premium sans-serif typography, smooth scroll animations, and subtle gradient or glassmorphism card effects. Apply the theme consistently on all pages.

Build a full-width hero section on the homepage with a large background image/gradient, a bold headline about SML Mahindra's commercial vehicle legacy, a short tagline, and two prominent CTA buttons ('Explore Vehicles' and 'Find a Dealer'). Include an animated navigation bar that becomes opaque on scroll.

Create a vehicle catalog section showcasing SML Mahindra's product lineup (buses, trucks, light commercial vehicles). Display vehicles in a responsive grid of modern cards, each showing a vehicle image, name, category tag, and a 'View Details' button. Clicking a card opens a modal or detail view with key specifications.

Build a dealer/service locator section where users can enter a city or state name to search for nearby dealers. Display results in a styled list with dealer name, address, phone number, and a 'Get Directions' link. Store dealer data (name, city, state, address, phone) in the backend and expose query functions.

Add an 'About Us' section highlighting SML Mahindra's history, key milestones, and values. Use a modern timeline layout for milestones and an icon-grid for core values (e.g., Innovation, Reliability, Service).

Implement a Contact & Inquiry form that captures the user's name, email, phone number, subject (dropdown: Sales, Service, Dealership, Other), and message. On submission, store the inquiry in the backend and show a success confirmation toast/message.

Build a sticky footer with SML Mahindra branding, quick navigation links (Home, Vehicles, Dealers, About, Contact), social media icon links, and a copyright notice. Style it with the dark theme and amber accent.
Render all generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them throughout the UI (hero background, vehicle cards, about section).

About us and company info section
